Title: Establishes distinctive "Long Island Sound" license plates
Summary: Establishes distinctive "Long Island Sound" license plates; creates the " Long Island Sound environmental fund" for the department of environmental conservation to distribute moneys to not-for-profit corporations, educational organizations or local governments undertaking projects aimed at the beautification of and environmental improvements to the Long Island Sound.
LawCode: Add ยง404-ff, V & T L; add ยง97-zzzz, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing distinctive "Long Island Sound" license plates; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the "Long Island Sound environmental fund"
